Class CSVDataSourceBuilder

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.Builder<DataSource>

    public class CSVDataSourceBuilder
extends TextDataSourceBuilder
    Simplified builder that returns a CSV data source (or delimited with another delimiter).
